b'Looking for a new tub? :bathtub: Shop prepared with our quick buying-guide, filled with five tips to consider when purchasing a freestanding tub.
1. Determine your size allowance and figure out how much room you have to play with. The last thing you want is to find out your perfect tub just won\xe2\x80\x99t fit. 
2. Pick your style\xe2\x80\x94are you looking for something to soak in or something the kids can\xe2\x80\x99t easily slip out of? 
3. Decide on the material you\xe2\x80\x99re looking for. Are you a classic porcelain personality or are you making a statement with stone or copper?
4. Cap it off with a stunning faucet, but remember that the style and material of your tub will determine what kind of faucets you can install.
5. Customize your tub with a variety of options, including massage jets, foam insulation and more!'
